content.rendered:
Made with just one ingredient, organic peanuts. Our All Natural Organic Peanut Butter is as natural and organic as it can get. The best addition to your diet to increase the protein intake.

All Arcelo Products are made up of the finest grade, fresh and nutritious ingredients from an ISO 22000 Certified and FSSAI approved Factory.

We manufacture India’s favorite Nut Butters daily so that you get the Freshest Product every time. Ideal for Weight watcher, Athletes and for over all health.
